vault_approle_auth_backend_login.description: Log into Vault using the AppRole auth backend.

role_id.description: The ID of the role to log in with.

secret_id.description: The secret ID of the role to log in with. Required

policies.description: A list of policies applied to the token.

renewable.description: Whether the token is renewable or not.

lease_duration.description: How long the token is valid for, in seconds.

lease_started.description: The date and time the lease started, in RFC 3339 format.

metadata.description: The metadata associated with the token.
